example.text: The Supreme Court's decision threatened women's health and freedom. And to this day, it demands a legislative response, not a response where the women of Texas are told that they have different rights.

We need to prioritize mental health education and services within our schools. My bipartisan bill with [[user]] would include mental health care as a key component of local school health policies, ensuring that our students have access to the resources they need to thrive. [[url]]

It was great to be with everyone raising awareness about type 1 diabetes at the [[user]] One Walk in MN. Earlier this month I was proud to once again push for strong funding for the Special Diabetes Program that supports people living with T1D. We won't stop fighting for a cure.
